name: Apple Farm (Geo3D)
description:
Grow an apple tree farm.

Description:

Grow apples tree. Collect the apples to sell. Buy more apple trees.

To sell apples:  place apples in the Basket then open the shop.

After some time the apple tree will die!

Controls:

Move = W, A, S, D .

Run = Shift.

Space = jump.

Left mouse button = Interact.
